comment: As an overweight fat person , I agree with about Lizzo . Accepting being fat is the same as accepting being poor or unsuccessful . Nobody wants it ; it s a matter of how hard we want to change it . But stop disguising giving up as acceptance .

comment: Rebranding failure as success is delusion disguised as progressiveness . Real acceptance is saying hey , I don t like where I m at right now and I need to work to fix it .
